1.title: Atommodeller

Det finnes en type atom for hvert stoff. 1600-tallet: Teorien om grunnstoffer slik vi kjenner den tar form. Passet godt med ideen om atomer. 1800-tallet: Ladde partikler (ioner og elektroner) observeres og knytes til ideen om atomer . Ca. 1900 K. K. 3.title: Bohrs atommodell, absorpsjon og emisjon
3.content: . | GjÃ¸re rede for [[Niels Bohrs]] modell for hydrogenatomet og [[postulatene]] som ligger til grunn for modellen. | Kunne beregne energinivÃ¥er i hydrogenatomet. | ForstÃ¥ emisjon og absorpsjon av [[Fotoner]] og gjÃ¸re energiberegninger i slike situasjoner. | . Repetisjon fra [[Atommodeller]] . Energien til et lysfoton er bestemt av a) farten og intensiteten b) bare farten c) bare intensiteten d) intensiteten og frekvensen e) bare frekvensen . Intensiteten blir energien til lyskilden pÃ¥ et vis Mange fotoner og/eller fotoner med mye energi â†’ stÃ¸rre intensitet $E = hf$ â†â†’ Energi = Plancks konstant * frekvens . Postulat 1: Et atom kan bare eksistere i bestemte energitilstander uten Ã¥ miste energi. Postulat 2: Hvis et atom gÃ¥r fra en energitilstand til en annen som har lavere energi, blir energiforskjellen sendt ut som et foton. $E_{etter} = E_{fÃ¸r} - E_{foton}$ . Elektroner i baner (energinivÃ¥er) rundt kjernen. Minst energi nÃ¥r elektroner er i innerste bane. Da er atomet i grunntilstanden. Dersom elektronet er i en annen bane enn den innerste, er atomet i en eksitert (excited) tilstand. Energi sendes ut i form av fotoner nÃ¥r et elektron faller ned til et lavere energinivÃ¥ . Det er minst energi nÃ¥r elektronene er i innerste bane fordi kjernen er positivt ladet, og elektronene er negativt ladet. Derfor krever det arbeid for Ã¥ fÃ¥ de ut fra kjernen. [[Naturvitensaplig metode]] . Eksperimenter og teoretisk arbeid birdrar til utvikling av en modell/teori. Dersom en modell ikke kan forklare et fenomen/eksperiment Ã¸nsker man Ã¥ forkaste eller endre modellen. En modell (eller en kombinasjon av flere modeller) som kan forklare mange ulike fenomen og har fÃ¥/ingen begrensninger kalles en [[teori]]. En god teori bÃ¸r ikke bare kunne forklare det som er observert, den bÃ¸r ogsÃ¥ kunne forutsi nye fenomener/resultater. Fordelaktig Ã¥ kunne gjÃ¸re forsÃ¸k som kan styrke eller svekke teorien. Bohrs formel for energien i de ulike energinivÃ¥ene . En=âˆ’Bn2n:EnerginivaËšB:BohrsÂ konstant=2,18â‹…10âˆ’18J\begin{aligned} E_{n} &amp;= \frac{-B}{n^{2}} \\ n &amp;: \text{EnerginivÃ¥} \\ B &amp;: \text{Bohrs konstant} = 2,18 \cdot 10^{-18}J \end{aligned}Enâ€‹nBâ€‹=n2âˆ’Bâ€‹:EnerginivaËš:BohrsÂ konstant=2,18â‹…10âˆ’18Jâ€‹ Formel for Ã¥ regne ut energien til et foton som blir sendt ut nÃ¥r hydrogenatomet gÃ¥r fra energitilstand n til m. $E_{foton} = E_{\gamma} = E_{fÃ¸r} - E_{etter} = E_{n} - E_{m}$ $E_{\gamma} = \frac{-B}{n^{2}} - \frac{-B}{m^{2}} \implies$ $E_{\gamma} = \frac{B}{m^{2}} - \frac{B}{n^{2}} = B (\frac{1}{m^{2}} - \frac{1}{n^2})$ . Hva er energien til et hydrogenatom i tilstanden n = 3? . $E_{n} = \frac{-B}{n^{2}}$ $E_{3} = \dfrac{-2,18 \cdot 10^{-18}}{3^{2}} = -2,42 \cdot 10^{-19}J$ . Et atom gÃ¥r fra tilstanden n = 4 til n = 2. Hva er bÃ¸lgelengden til lyset som blir snedt ut? . Regner ut fotonenergien (nb: kommer sluttilstanden fÃ¸rst eller sist) $E_{\gamma} = B \left(\frac{1}{m^{2}} - \frac{1}{n^{2}}\right) = 2,18 \cdot 10^{-18} J \left(\frac{1}{2^{2}} - \frac{1}{4^{2}}\right) = 4,0875 \cdot 10^{-19}$ $E_{\gamma} = \frac{hc}{\lambda}$ $\lambda = \frac{hc}{E_{\gamma}} = \frac{6,63 \cdot 10^{-34} J \cdot s \cdot 3,00 \cdot 10^{8} m/s}{4,0875 \cdot 10^{-18} J}$ $\lambda = 486 \cdot 10^{-9}m = \underline{\underline{486nm}}$ . [[Ioniseringsenergi]] . [[Ion]]: Atom med positiv eller negativ ladning. Det har gitt fra seg eller mottatt elektroner. Ionisering: Ã… itlfÃ¸re nok energi til at elektronene forlater atomet. Ioniseringsenergien: Energien som mÃ¥ til for Ã¥ ionisere et atom som er i grunntilstanden. Ioniseringsenergien til hydrogen: $E = -E_{1} = 2,18 \cdot 10^{18}J$ . Hvordan havner atomet i en eksitert tilstand? . Elektromagnetisk strÃ¥ling (lys): Hvis vi lyser pÃ¥ atomer og molekyler vil strÃ¥ling med â€œriktigâ€ bÃ¸lgelengde absorberes. Dette kalles absorpsjon. StrÃ¸m: Bombarderer stoffet med elektroner. I kollisjonene overfÃ¸res energi slik at elektronene kan hoppe til et skall lenger ute, atomet kommer i et hÃ¸yere energinivÃ¥. Emisjoner i andre grunnstoffer . Forskjellige atomer har forskjellige emisjons- og absorpsjonsspekter. Emisjon og absorpsjon . Faste stoffer sender ut EM-strÃ¥ling med alle slags bÃ¸lgelengder. Gasser sender bare ut lys bÃ¸lgelengder som passer med energiovergangene mellom de ulike energinivÃ¥ene. Emisjon En kald gass vil absorbere bestemte bÃ¸lgelengder. BÃ¸lgelengdene mÃ¥ passe med energiovergangene mellom de ulike energinivÃ¥ene. Absorpsjon. Nordlys . Nordlys er lys emitert fra oksygen og nitrogenmolekyler. Molekyler har ogsÃ¥ emisjons- og absorpsjonsspektere. Molekyler kan absorbere sammenhengende omrÃ¥der i spekteret, ikke bare linjer.

8.content: Oppsummert, lÃ¦remÃ¥l . | ForstÃ¥ og kunne bruke begreper knyttet til bÃ¸lgebevegelse. | Forklare sammenhengen mellom bÃ¸lgefart, frekvens og bÃ¸lgelengde, og bruke den i beregninger. | $v = f \cdot \lambda$ | . | Forklare fenomenet overlagring. | Forklare hvordan interferens oppstÃ¥r og gjÃ¸re beregninger med interferensformelen. | Kjenne til det elektromagnetiske spekteret og forklare hvordan bÃ¸lgelengde pÃ¥virker brytning og interferensmÃ¸nster. | . BÃ¸lge: En bÃ¸lge er en svingning som forflytter seg. Stedet med maksimalt utslag forflytter seg. Transversal bÃ¸lge: En bÃ¸lge der utslagene skjer pÃ¥ tvers av bevegelsesretningen kalles transversal. BÃ¸lgelengde: Minste avstand mellom to punkter som er i same svingetilstand. F.eks. fra bÃ¸lgetopp til neste bÃ¸lgetopp Symbol: $\lambda$ . %%ğŸ–‹ Edit in Excalidraw%% . BÃ¸lgefart: Hastigheten til bÃ¸lgen. Dvs. f.eks. hastigheten en bÃ¸lgetopp beveger seg med i bÃ¸lgeretningen. Eksempel: Vi mÃ¥ler avstand og tid det tar for en bÃ¸lgetopp Ã¥ bevege seg til vinduet og regner ut bÃ¸lgefarten Simulasjon: PHET Wave on a String MÃ¥ler en bÃ¸lgetopp som bruker 5,35s fra begynnelsen til vinduet, en strekning pÃ¥ 6,6cm. $t = 5,35s$ $s = 6,6cm$ $v = \frac{s}{t} = \frac{6,6cm}{5,35s} = 1,2cm/s$ (Note: bruker ikke SI-enheter) . Sammenhengen mellom frekvens, bÃ¸lgelengde og bÃ¸lgefart . En periode er tiden det tar for en hel svingning. PÃ¥ en periode beveger bÃ¸lgen seg en bÃ¸lgelengde. I lÃ¸pet av en periode vil en bÃ¸lge bevege seg en bÃ¸lgelengde. Dermed har vi: $v = \frac{s}{t} = \frac{\lambda}{T} = \lambda \cdot \frac{1}{T} = \lambda f$ . Eksempel: $\lambda = 3,1cm$ $f = 0,39Hz$ (Note: Hz og 1/s eller s^-1 er det samme) $v = \lambda f = 3,1cm \cdot 0,39s^{-1} = 1,21cm/s$ . Svingninger . Svingning: En regelmessig bevegelse opp og ned. For noen bÃ¸lger skjer svingningene langs samme linje som bÃ¸lgen beveger seg. Da har vi en longditunal bÃ¸lge. Eksempel: lydbÃ¸lger Dersom vi ser pÃ¥ trykket (antall partikler) i et punkt vil dette ogsÃ¥ svinge. En lydbÃ¸lge kan derfor ogsÃ¥ beskrives som en svingning i trykk som brer seg utover. Utslag: Hvor langt objektet har beveget seg fra likevekstlinja. E.g. $-9cm$. Svingetilstand: Utslag og hvilken retning bevegelsen skjer. Amplitude: StÃ¸rste mulige utslag til en svingning. E.g. $21cm$. Periode: Tiden det tar pÃ¥ en hel svingning, det vil si fra loddet er i en svingetilstand til det er i samme svingetilstand igjen. F.eks. fra bunnpunkt til bunnpunkt igjen. Symbol: $T$ . Frekvens: Antall svingninger per tidsintervall (sekund). Antall ganger loddet er i samme svingetilstand i lÃ¸pet av et tidsintervall (sekund). Symbol: $f$ SI-enhet: $Hertz (Hz)$ $\text{Frekvens} = \frac{\text{I}}{\text{Periode}}$ $\text{f} = \frac{\text{I}}{\text{T}}$ . Eksempel frekvens og periode . Vi mÃ¥ler perioden til en elastisk pendel og regner ut frekvensen $T = 1,22s$ $f = \frac{1}{1,22s} = 0,8 Hz$ . For mer nÃ¸yaktig mÃ¥leresultat kan vi mÃ¥le tiden til flere svingninger (10) $f = 12,67$ Finner periode (tid per svingning) $T = \dfrac{12,67s}{10} = 1,267s$ Regner ut frekvensen $f = \dfrac{1}{T} = \dfrac{1}{1,267s} = \underline{\underline{0,789Hz}}$ . BÃ¸lgeenergi . Alle bÃ¸lger overfÃ¸rer energi fra der hvor bÃ¸lger starter til der den ender. I form av overfÃ¸ring/forflytning av bevegelsesenergi. BÃ¸lger har energi. Etterhvert som bÃ¸lgetoppen flytter seg bortover, flytter energien seg. Eksempel: BÃ¸lge pÃ¥ en streng. %%ğŸ–‹ Edit in Excalidraw%% . StÃ¸rre amplitude gir mer energi. StÃ¸rre bÃ¸lgefart gjÃ¸r at energien transporteres raskere. Time 2 â€” 20-01-2022 . Dette kalles et interferensmÃ¸nster . MÃ¥l for timen Kunne forklare begrepene . BÃ¸yning av bÃ¸lger . Dersom vi sender en bÃ¸lge gjennom en spalte (trang Ã¥pning), vil den bÃ¸yes pÃ¥ andre siden av Ã¥pningen . Fase . Fase: Beskriver hvor i svingebevegelsen bÃ¸lgen er i et punkt. Nesten det samme som svingetilstand. Angitt gjerne som et tall mellom 0 og $2\pi$. Svingetilstand: Hvor stort er utslaget og hvilen retning svingebevegelsen skjer. To bÃ¸lger er i fase i et punkt hvis de har samme fase i det punktet. BÃ¸lgefronter . Simulasjon: PHET BÃ¸lger â€” Introduksjon . For Ã¥ tegne bÃ¸lger kan vi bruke farge til Ã¥ indikere utslaget. En enda enklere mÃ¥te Ã¥ gjÃ¸re dette pÃ¥ er Ã¥ tegne bÃ¸lgefronter. BÃ¸lgefront: Linjer gjennom punkter pÃ¥ bÃ¸lgen som er i samme fase. F.eks. linjer som markerer bÃ¸lgetopp. %%ğŸ–‹ Edit in Excalidraw%% . Overlagring . Hva skjer nÃ¥r to bÃ¸lger mÃ¸tes? . Kort forklart, nÃ¥r to smÃ¥ bÃ¸lger mÃ¸tes vil vi fÃ¥ en stor bÃ¸lge. BÃ¸lger kan passere hverandre uten Ã¥ endre form, amplitude, frekvens, eller bÃ¸lgelengde. Interferens: Forsterkning og utlsokning . NÃ¥r to flater er i kontakt med hverandre og beveger seg i forhold til hverandre sÃ¥ er friksjonen gitt ved: Friksjonskraft = Friksjonstall * Normalkraft $R = \mu \cdot N$ ($\mu$: Gresk â€œMuâ€ (uttales my)) . Friksjonstallet for glidefriksjonen er 0.75. b) Hva blir akselerasjonen til kassa dersom vi dytter med kraften vi fant a a). a) Vi mÃ¥ dytte med stÃ¸rre kraft enn maksimal hvilefriksjon. $R = M_H \cdot N$ Newtons 1. lov i y-retning: $N = G = mg = N = 50kg \cdot 9.81m/s^2$ .

Dette forsÃ¸ket bidro til at bÃ¸lgeteorien om lys ble styrket. | [[Konstruktiv interferens]]: BÃ¸lgetopp mÃ¸ter bÃ¸lgetopp, bÃ¸lgebunn mÃ¸ter bÃ¸lgebunn. | $\Delta s = n \lambda$ | $n = 0,1,2,\ldots$ | $\Delta s = \vert s,p - s,p \vert$ | . | [[Destruktiv interferens]]: BÃ¸lgetopp mÃ¸ter bÃ¸lgebunn. | $\Delta s = (n - 1/2) \lambda$ | . | [[Veiforskjell]] . | $\Delta s = d sin \theta$ | d: Avstand mellom spaltene | $\theta$: Vinkel mellom 0. maksimum og punkt P. | SlÃ¥r sammen de formlene, da fÃ¥r vi [[youngs interferensformel]] . | $n \lambda = d sin \theta$ | . | . | . Optisk gitter og gitterkonstant . I et optisk gitter er det mange spalter. Det er samme avstanden d mellom alle nabospalter. Avstanden d kalles gitterkonstant. InterferensmÃ¸nsteret med gitter har samme maksimum som det vi fÃ¥r ved en dobbelspalte. nÎ»=dsinÎ¸n \lambda = d sin \thetanÎ»=dsinÎ¸ Et optisk gitter gir tydeligere maksimum og ikke noe lys ellers. Omregning mellom linjer per mm og gitterkonstant. AvstandÂ mellomÂ nabospalter:Â d=1mm300=Î¼m300=3,333â€¦Î¼m=3,333â€¦âˆ’6mâ€¾â€¾\text{Avstand mellom nabospalter: } d = \frac{1mm}{300} = \frac{\mu m}{300} = 3,333 \ldots \mu m = \underline{\underline{3,333 \ldots^{-6}m}}AvstandÂ mellomÂ nabospalter:Â d=3001mmâ€‹=300Î¼mâ€‹=3,333â€¦Î¼m=3,333â€¦âˆ’6mâ€‹â€‹ . Q: Vi sender blÃ¥tt lys inn mot et optisk gitter og fÃ¥r et interferensmÃ¸nster. Hva skjer med vinkelen mellom 0. og 1. ordens maksimum hvis vi gjÃ¸r gitterkonstanten mindre? . Q: Et gitter har 6000 linjer per cm. monokromatisk lys med bÃ¸lgelengden 600 nm blir sendt vinkelrett inn mot gitteret. a) Hvor stor blir vinkelen til fÃ¸rste interferensmaksimum? b) Hvor mange lysstriper kan vi se pÃ¥ skjerm bak gitteret? c) Hvor stor er vinkelen mellom 1. og 2. ordensmaksimum? . $d = \frac{1cm}{6000} = \frac{10^{-2}m}{6000} = 1,6667 \cdot 10^{-6}m$ Youngs interferensformel: $n \lambda = d \cdot sin \theta$ $sin \theta = \frac{n \lambda}{d} = \frac{1 \cdot 600 \cdot 10^{-9}m}{1,6667 \cdot 10^{-6}m}$ $\theta = sin^{-1} \left(\frac{600 \cdot 10^{-3}m}{1,6667m}\right) = 21,1 ^{\circ}$ .

15.title: Newtons 1. lov
15.content: Newtons fÃ¸rste lov sier at dersom det ikke virker noen krefter pÃ¥ et legeme, eller hvis summen av kreftene pÃ¥ det er lik null, sÃ¥ vil legemet enten forbli i ro eller fortsette Ã¥ bevege seg med konstant fart i en rettlinjet bevegelse. Det trengs altsÃ¥ en kraft bÃ¥de til Ã¥ sette et legeme i bevegelse og til Ã¥ endre hastigheten pÃ¥ det. Newtons fÃ¸rste lov kalles ogsÃ¥ treghetsloven. Den beskriver hvordan et legeme oppfÃ¸rer seg pÃ¥ grunn av sin treghet nÃ¥r det ikke virker krefter pÃ¥ det.

16.title: Newtons 2. lov
16.content: Newtons andre lov sier at nÃ¥r et legeme blir pÃ¥virket av Ã©n eller flere krefter, vil det fÃ¥ en akselerasjon i den retningen kreftene virker. Summen av kreftene pÃ¥ legemet er lik legemets masse ganger dets akselerasjon. Denne loven kan beskrives med formelen $F = ma$ der F er summen av kreftene som virker pÃ¥ legemet, m er massen til legemet og a er akselerasjonen.

17.title: Newtons 3. lov
17.content: Newtons tredje lov sier at nÃ¥r et legeme virker pÃ¥ et annet legeme med en kraft, vil det andre legemet virke tilbake pÃ¥ det fÃ¸rste med en like stor kraft i motsatt retning. De to kreftene som omtales i Newtons tredje lov, kalles kraft og motkraft. Kreftene er like store, og motsatt rettet.

Bestem likninga for linja. âœ Vi trenger ett punkt og stigningstallet. Finner a: $a = \dfrac{\Delta y}{\Delta x} = \dfrac{y_2 - y_1}{x_2 - x_1} = \dfrac{1 - (-2)}{2 - 0} = \underline{\dfrac{3}{2}}$ Velger punkt (0, -2) og setter inn i ettpunktsformelen: $y - y_1 = a (x - x_1)$ $y - (-2) = \dfrac{3}{2}(x - 0 )$ $y + 2 = \dfrac{3}{2}x$ $y = \dfrac{3}{2}x - 2$ . â“ Ei linje er parallell med linja $y = - \dfrac{3}{4}x + 5$ og gÃ¥r gjennom punktet (1, 3). Bestem likninga for linja. âœ Parallelle linjer $\implies$ samme stigningtall AltsÃ¥ er $a = - \dfrac{3}{4}$ og vi har punktet (1, 3): Ettpunktsformel: $y - y_1 = a(x - x_1)$ $y - 3 = - \dfrac{3}{4}(x - 1)$ $y = - \dfrac{3}{4}x + \dfrac{3}{4} + 3$ $y = - \dfrac{3}{4}x + \dfrac{3}{4} + \dfrac{12}{4}$ $\underbrace{y = - \frac{3}{4}x + \dfrac{15}{4}}_\text{\color{red}y = ax + b}$ . â“ https://i.runarsf.dev/runar/zewIgOKE20.png/raw .

38.content: \requirecancelâˆ£Potensâ†’(â€‰2â†Grunntallet4â†Eksponentâ€‰)=2â‹…2â‹…2â‹…2\require{cancel} \large\vert{Potens \rightarrow \LARGE{ \left(\,2_{\leftarrow Grunntallet}^{4 \leftarrow Eksponent}\,\right) } = 2 \cdot 2 \cdot 2 \cdot 2}\requirecancelâˆ£Potensâ†’(2â†Grunntallet4â†Eksponentâ€‹)=2â‹…2â‹…2â‹…2 $\boxed{a^{n} \cdot a^{m} = \underline{\underline{a^{n+m}}}}$ . 23â‹…25=2â‹…2â‹…2undefined3â‹…2â‹…2â‹…2â‹…2â‹…2undefined5=23+5=28â€¾â€¾2^3 \cdot 2^5 = \underbrace{2 \cdot 2 \cdot 2}_\text{3} \cdot \underbrace{2 \cdot 2 \cdot 2 \cdot 2 \cdot 2}_\text{5} = 2^{3+5} = \underline{\underline{2^8}}23â‹…25=32â‹…2â‹…2â€‹â€‹â‹…52â‹…2â‹…2â‹…2â‹…2â€‹â€‹=23+5=28â€‹â€‹ 25â‹…37â‹…26â‹…32=25+6â‹…37+2=211â‹…39â€¾â€¾2^5 \cdot 3^7 \cdot 2^6 \cdot 3^2 = 2^{5+6} \cdot 3^{7+2} = \underline{\underline{2^{11} \cdot 3^9}}25â‹…37â‹…26â‹…32=25+6â‹…37+2=211â‹…39â€‹â€‹ . $\boxed{\dfrac{a^m}{a^n} = a^{m-n}}$ . 3537=3â‹…3â‹…3â‹…3â‹…33â‹…3â‹…3âˆ—3âˆ—3â‹…3â‹…3=132=3âˆ’2=35âˆ’7=3âˆ’2â€¾â€¾\dfrac {3^5} {3^7} = \dfrac {\cancel{3} \cdot \cancel{3} \cdot \cancel{3} \cdot \cancel{3} \cdot \cancel{3}} {\cancel{3} \cdot \cancel{3} \cdot \cancel{3} * \cancel{3} * \cancel{3} \cdot 3 \cdot 3} = \dfrac {1} {3^2} = 3^{-2} = 3^{5 - 7} = \underline{\underline{3^{-2}}}3735â€‹=3 | â€‹â‹…3 | â€‹â‹…3 | â€‹âˆ—3 | â€‹âˆ—3 | â€‹â‹…3â‹…33 | â€‹â‹…3 | â€‹â‹…3 | â€‹â‹…3 | â€‹â‹…3 | â€‹â€‹=321â€‹=3âˆ’2=35âˆ’7=3âˆ’2â€‹â€‹ . $\boxed{a^0 = 1 , a \ne 0}$ . 50=30=23570=1â€¾â€¾5^0 = 3^0 = 2357^0 = \underline{\underline{1}}50=30=23570=1â€‹â€‹ 3232=3â‹…33â‹…3=1=32âˆ’2=30â€¾â€¾\dfrac {3^2} {3^2} = \dfrac {\cancel{3} \cdot \cancel{3}} {\cancel{3} \cdot \cancel{3}} = 1 = 3^{2 - 2} = \underline{\underline{3^0}}3232â€‹=3 | â€‹â‹…3 | â€‹3 | â€‹â‹…3 | â€‹â€‹=1=32âˆ’2=30â€‹â€‹ . $\boxed{a^{-n} = \dfrac{1}{a^n}}$ . $\boxed{a^n = \dfrac{1}{a^{-n}}}$ . Begge versjonene er grei som fasit, men det er vanlig Ã¥ bruke samme form som spÃ¸rsmÃ¥let er oppgitt i. $\boxed{\left(\frac{a}{b}\right)^{n} = \underline{\underline{\frac{a^{n}}{b^{n}}}}}$ . $\boxed{\left(a \cdot b\right)^{n} = \underline{\underline{a^{n} \cdot b^{n}}}}$ . $\boxed{\left(a^{n}\right)^{m} = \underline{\underline{a^{n \cdot m}}}}$ .

39.title: Skalarprodukt
39.content: [[Skalarer]] er et matematisk objekt som kun er definert med en stÃ¸rrelse, mens [[vektorer]] $\overrightarrow{a}$ har bÃ¥de stÃ¸rrelse og retning. Q: 13.2 Skalarproduktet â€” Eks 1 . Det gir ikke mening hvis $\overrightarrow{a} = 5, \overrightarrow{b} = 7, u = 90 ^{\circ} \implies \overrightarrow{a} \cdot \overrightarrow{b} = \vert \overrightarrow{a} \vert \cdot \vert \overrightarrow{b} \vert \cdot cos ( u ) = 5 \cdot 7 \cdot cos ( 90 ^{\circ} ) = \underline{\underline{0}}$ â€¦Her er begge vektorene != null, og skalarproduktet er null. Skalarproduktet kan her vÃ¦re null fordi vektorene stÃ¥r vinkelrett $\bot$ pÃ¥ hverandre. Hva er det jeg misforstÃ¥r? .

43.title: Bash Argument Parsing
43.content: # Argument parsing {{{ PARAMETER_DEFAULT="" positional=() while test "${#}" -gt "0"; do case "${1}" in -h|--help) # {{{ usage exit 0 shift;; # }}} -a|--archive) # {{{ ACTION="archive" shift;; # }}} -u|--unarchive) # {{{ ACTION="unarchive" shift;; # }}} -e|--encrypt) # {{{ ACTION="encrypt" shift;; # }}} -d|--decrypt) # {{{ ACTION="decrypt" shift;; # }}} -y|--yes) # {{{ shift;; # }}} --*) # {{{ printf "Unknown option: ${1}\n" exit 1 shift;; -*) shopts="${1}" if test "${#shopts}" -le "2"; then printf "Unknown option: ${shopts}\n" exit 2 fi shift set -- "${shopts:0:2}" "-${shopts:2}" "${@}" ;; *) positional+=("${1}") shift;; # }}} esac done set -- "${positional[@]}" if test "${#}" -lt "1"; then test -e "${XDG_CONFIG_HOME:-${HOME:-~}/.config}/.vault" &amp;&amp; VAULT="${XDG_CONFIG_HOME:-${HOME:-~}/.config}/.vault" test -e "${HOME:-~}/.vault" &amp;&amp; VAULT="${HOME:-~}/.vault" test -e "./.vault" &amp;&amp; VAULT="./.vault" test -e "./vault" &amp;&amp; VAULT="./vault" set -- "${VAULT:?No vault found...}" fi # }}} .

44.title: Firefox customization and hardening
44.content: Firefox customization and hardening . Customizing . about:config . | toolkit.legacyUserProfileCustomizations.stylesheets: true | layers.acceleration.force-enabled: true | gfx.webrender.all: true | svg.context-properties.content.enabled: true . | firefoxcss | uc.css.js | fx-autoconfig | . Hardening . Yet Another Firefox Hardening Guide â€” Chris Xiao . My guide to improving security and privacy in Firefox without sacrificing convenience. Table of Contents . Why not Google Chrome? . Statistics clearly show that Google Chrome is the most popular browser, and itâ€™s extremely fast and secure. However, Google collects a large amount of data and wants to know everything about you, which is why theyâ€™re dominating online advertising. Chrome is also not completely open source. Even though Chrome is based on the Chromium open-source project, Google Chrome comes with proprietary components, such as the Chrome Cleanup Tool on Windows and the built-in updater. Why hardening Firefox? . Even though Firefox is much better for your privacy than Google Chrome, itâ€™s not great out-of-the-box. By default, Firefox collects data via telemetry and crash reporting, and many privacy-enhancing features arenâ€™t enabled. By hardening Firefox, telemetry and crash reporting can be disabled, and online tracking can be mostly prevented. This way, there is much less chance for most websites to track you. Before you start . | This guide is written for the latest version of Firefox. It has been tested on Firefox version 78 and later. | Update Firefox to the lastet stable version before you start. If youâ€™re using Firefox ESR, update Firefox to the latest ESR release. | If you see an option that doesnâ€™t exist in your version of Firefox, just ignore it. | . Change Firefox Preferences . To open the Firefox Preferences menu, open menu (top-right of browser window) and click â€œPreferences.â€ Alternatively, enter about:preferences into the address bar and hit enter. Remove Pocket from your home page . Under Home &gt; Firefox Home Content, UNCHECK Recommended by Pocket . Change your default search engine . I recommend DuckDuckGo as an alternative to Google, as it respects your privacy and doesnâ€™t track you. If youâ€™d like to use DuckDuckGo as your primary search engine, simply go to Search &gt; Default search engine and change it to DuckDuckGo. Enable Tracking Protection . Under Privacy &amp; Security &gt; Enhanced Tracking Protection, select Custom. CHECK all options and select All third-party cookies under Cookies. This may cause a small number of websites to break, but itâ€™s worth it for security and privacy. If you encounter a website that doesnâ€™t function without third-party cookies (such as Microsoft Teams and Pearson MyLab), you may temporarily disable Firefoxâ€™s Tracking Protection for that website. To do this, click on the Shield icon on the left of the address bar, and toggle off Enhanced Tracking Protection for this site. Disable Password Saving . On the same page, under Logins and Passwords, UNCHECK Ask to save logins and passwords for websites. Itâ€™s usually not a good idea to save passwords in your browser. You should use a password manager instead. For most people, I recommend Bitwarden. Decline location access . On the same page, in Location Settingsâ€¦, CHECK Block new requests asking to access your location. This denies geolocation permission prompts by default, but the geolocation capability is retained. Disallow notifications . On the same page, in Notification Settingsâ€¦, CHECK Block new requests asking to allow notifications. This denies notification permission prompts by default, but the web notification capability is retained. Disallow autoplay . On the same page, in Autoplay Settingsâ€¦, set â€œDefault for all websitesâ€ to Block Audio and Video for. This prevents audio/video from automatically playing. Disable telemetry and error reporting . On the same page, UNCHECK EVERYTHING under Firefox Data Collection and Use. Enable HTTPS-Only Mode . On the same page, under HTTPS-Only Mode, select Enable HTTPS-Only Mode in all windows. HTTPS provides encrypted communication between your browser and websites, and you should always use HTTPS when available. With HTTPS-Only Mode enabled, Firefox will upgrade all connections to HTTPS, and youâ€™ll see a warning when a website doesnâ€™t support HTTPS. Dive into advanced settings . To access these advanced settings, enter about:config into the address bar and hit enter. When you see a warning screen, click I accept the risk to continue. All configuration items are in alphabetical order, and easily searchable using the search bar on the top of the page. In this section, configuration items are highlighted, and their values are in bold. Double-click on a configuration item to modify it. If the item is a boolean, double-clicking it will change it from true to false, or vice versa. If the item is an integer or a string, double-clicking it will open a pop-up box to edit the value. Note: Many options below should have no impact on Firefoxâ€™s usability and are recommended for everyone. However, some will break certain functionalities that users depend on. Each option below is marked with a Level (L1/L2/L3), where L1 items are recommended for everyone, L2 items may cause minor inconveniences, L3 items are intended for advanced users. If you tweak L2/L3 items, I recommend installing the Privacy Settings extension, which allow you to temporarily change certain settings that prevent websites from functioning properly. Disable telemetry [L1] . Making these changes disables Firefox telemetry: . | Change browser.newtabpage.activity-stream.feeds.telemetry to false | Change browser.ping-centre.telemetry to false | Change browser.tabs.crashReporting.sendReport to false | Change devtools.onboarding.telemetry.logged to false | Change toolkit.telemetry.enabled to false | Delete the URL for toolkit.telemetry.server, and leave it empty | Change toolkit.telemetry.unified to false | . Disable Pocket [L1] . If you donâ€™t use Pocket, or you donâ€™t want Firefoxâ€™s Pocket integration, make the following changes: . | Change browser.newtabpage.activity-stream.section.highlights.includePocket to false | Change extensions.pocket.enabled to false | . Disable prefetching [L1] . Even though prefetching may speed things up a bit, it may connect to servers without user intervention (which can be a privacy issue) and its performance benefits are minimal. Making these changes will disable prefetching: . | Change network.dns.disablePrefetch to true | Change network.prefetch-next to false | . Disable JavaScript in PDF [L1] . Firefox 88 introduced the ability to execute JavaScript in PDF documents. While there are legitimate uses for JavaScript in PDF (such as form validation), such uses are not very common. In addition, it could be used for malicious purposes, so itâ€™s generally a good idea to disable this feature. To disable JavaScript support in PDF documents, change pdfjs.enableScripting to false. Harden SSL preferences [L1] . Making these changes will disable insecure SSL ciphers and force safe negotiation: . | Change security.ssl3.rsa_des_ede3_sha to false | Change security.ssl.require_safe_negotiation to true | . Disable Firefox account features [L1] . If you donâ€™t want to sync your browser data with a Firefox account, you can simply use Firefox without signing in. For those who want to completely disable this feature, change identity.fxaccounts.enabled to false. Disable geolocation support [L2] . This prevents websites from accessing your location information. Change geo.enabled to false. If you do not want to disable geolocation capabilities altogether, you may skip this step. Disable notification support [L2] . Web notifications are often not useful and many find it annoying. To disable it completely, change dom.webnotifications.enabled to false. If you do not want to disable notifications capabilities altogether, you may skip this step. Disable WebRTC [L2] . WebRTC can potentially expose your real IP address, changing the following disables it: . | Change media.peerconnection.enabled to false | Change media.navigator.enabled to false | . Note: This will break any site that uses real-time audio/video communication, which includes almost all real-time chat and conferencing apps. Disable WebGL [L2] . WebGL is used for some graphical web apps and online games, but itâ€™s also a security risk and can potentially be used for fingerprinting. Disable it by changing webgl.disabled to true. Note: This will break any site that uses WebGL for graphics, which includes most modern online games and complex graphical sites. Resist browser fingerprinting [L3] . This feature can decrease advertisersâ€™ and online trackersâ€™ ability to identify you. Change privacy.resistFingerprinting to true. Note: Based on my experience, enabling this can lead to noticeable performance and stability impacts. Please proceed with caution. Referrers tell websites how you came to their sites, which can be used to track you. To prevent referrer headers from being sent, change network.http.sendRefererHeader to 0. Note: Many websites, especially ones with forms and logins, depend on referrers for security and spam protection. If you donâ€™t send the referrer header, these sites will break. Change cookie behaviors [L3] . Websites often store a small amount of information, called â€œcookies,â€ to store information (such as remembering login status and preferences) and track you. Isolating cookies cookies and other stored information to the first party domain prevents cross-site tracking. To enable this feature, change privacy.firstparty.isolate to true. Note: Firefox 86 introduced Total Cookie Protection, which stores each websiteâ€™s cookies in their own â€œcookie jar.â€ This may conflict with privacy.firstparty.isolate. If you donâ€™t want websites to store any cookies at all, change network.cookie.lifetimePolicy to 2. Firefox will automatically delete cookies at the end of browsing sessions. Note: Doing this will sign you out of many websites when you close Firefox, and websites will not be able to store any data on your device. Install some add-ons . Must-haves . These add-ons require minimal configuration and can dramatically improve the security and privacy in Firefox. I recommend everyone install these extensions. uBlock Origin . The most powerful open-source ad blocker, period. It can block ads, trackers, malwares, annoyances, and more. It also significantly improves page load speed. If you want to customize it, please refer to the official wiki. Decentraleyes . Decentraleyes prevents you against tracking though â€œfreeâ€ CDN providers by serving common static files (such as the ones from Google Hosted Libraries) from your local device. After you install it, you can just forget about it. A password manager . If you already have a password manager, just install the add-on for it. If you donâ€™t use a password manager, you really should consider using one. I recommend Bitwarden, which is 100% open source and very easy to use. Recommended . These add-ons are recommended for most users, but they require some configuration and maintenance. Cookie AutoDelete . This extension automatically deletes cookies and site data from closed tabs, which prevents most websites from tracking you with cookies. If you set Firefox to delete all cookies and site data on exit, you might not need this. After installing, open its settings page from its toolbar icon. Once youâ€™re in there, check the box for Enable Automatic Cleaning and Enable Cleanup on Domain Change. Then, go to List of Expressions, and whitelist all websites that you wish to keep cookies for, including websites you want to stay logged in to and save preferences. In most cases, whitelisting the websitesâ€™ domain (without www) will do, but some websites have cookies associated with multiple domains, including: . | Microsoft: whitelist login.live.com for personal accounts; whitelist login.microsoftonline.com for work/school accounts | Google: whitelist google.com and accounts.google.com | ProtonMail: whitelist *.protonmail.com and check â€œKeep LocalStorageâ€ | Tutanota: whitelist mail.tutanota.com and check â€œKeep LocalStorageâ€ | . Privacy Settings . Privacy Settings creates a toolbar panel to alter Firefoxâ€™s built-in privacy settings. Sometimes, you may have to disable some privacy protection for websites to function properly. When you finish using those websites, re-enable the privacy settings you just disabled for maximum privacy protection. After installing, donâ€™t change any settings with it yet. Here are a few cases you might want to change your privacy settings: . | Enable network.peerConnectionEnabled to use real-time audio/video communication (Zoom, WebEx, Discord, etc.). | Many web forms will not work when the browser isnâ€™t sending referrers. Enable websites.referrersEnabled temporarily to send referrers. | . Changelog . | (11/10/2019) Added more settings and updated options for Firefox 70. | (1/1/2020) Startpage is no longer recommended. | (1/1/2020) Changed media.autoplay.default to block autoplay for audio and video. | (5/16/2020) Clarify instructions under Before you start | (5/16/2020) Fixed broken link under uBlock Origin | (5/16/2020) Added whitelisting instruction for Microsoft work/school accounts | (12/23/2020) Refine wording throughout the article, and add information about third-party cookies. | (12/23/2020) Added whitelisting instruction for ProtonMail and Tutanota | (12/23/2020) Removed recommendation for HTTPS Everywhere, as Firefox 83 and later has HTTPS-Only Mode. | (3/29/2021) Added info on permission settings. | (3/29/2021) Added level ratings and clarifications for several about:config options. | (5/5/2021) Added guide to disable JavaScript support in PDF (for Firefox 88 and later). | .

45.title: Linux kiosk mode
45.content: Denne prosedyren er en skriftlig og mer utbredt versjon av denne YouTube Videoen, og baserer seg pÃ¥ Ubuntu 20.04 LTS med Firefox/Chromium som app for kiosk-mode, men bÃ¸r la seg adaptere til andre system og applikasjoner. I praksis kjÃ¸rer dette bare en instans av nettleseren i headless/kiosk-modus over desktop environmentet (Gnome) og fjerner sÃ¥ mange distraksjoner som mulig. VNC-serveren kjÃ¸rer pÃ¥ port 5905 og kan kobles til med IP:PORT, f.eks. med Remmina. | Installer en LTS versjon av Ubuntu (testet pÃ¥ 20.04) i minimal mode, ikke installer ekstra software eller oppdateringer under oppsett. I denne prosedyren er brukernavnet â€œkioskâ€ brukt. | Oppdater pakkeinformasjon: sudo apt-get updateÂ  | Installer nÃ¸dvendige pakker: sudo apt-get install -y vim openssh-server slick-greeter x11vnc Bytt til lightdm om du fÃ¥r spÃ¸rsmÃ¥l om det. | Fjern distraksjoner fra system Settings . | Notifications â†’ Do Not Disturb: Check | Privacy â†’ Screen Lock â†’ Automatic Screen Lock: Uncheck | Privacy â†’ Screen Lock â†’ Lock Screen on Suspend: Uncheck | Privacy â†’ Screen Lock â†’ Show Notification on Lock Screen: Uncheck | Privacy â†’ Screen Lock â†’ Blank Screen Delay: Never | Privacy â†’ Diagnostics â†’ Send error reports to Canonical: Never | Sound â†’ System Volume: 0 | Sound â†’ Input | Volume: 0 | Power â†’ Power Saving | Blank Screen: Never | Power â†’ Suspend &amp; Power Button | Automatic Suspend: Off | . | Automatisk innlogging: sudo vim /etc/lightdm/lightdm.confÂ  [SeatDefaults] autologin-user=kiosk autologin-user-timeout=0 user-session=ubuntu greeter-session=unity-greeter . | sudo vim /etc/lightdm/lightdm.conf.d/50-myconfig.conf [SeatDefaults] autologin-user=kiosk . | Sett opp autostart av kiosk-script: mkdir /home/kiosk/.config/autostartÂ  | vim /home/kiosk/.config/autostart/kiosk.desktopÂ  [Desktop Entry] Type=Application Name=Kiosk Exec=/home/kiosk/kiosk.sh X-GNOME-Autostart-enabled=true . | vim /home/kiosk/kiosk.shÂ  #!/bin/bash export DISPLAY=:0 # Hide the mouse from the display unclutter &amp; # Start x11vnc /usr/bin/x11vnc -create -xkb -noxrecord -noxfixes -display :0 -auth /var/run/lightdm/root/:0 -rfbauth /home/kiosk/.x11vnc.pass -forever -rfbport 5905 &amp; . | chmod +x /home/kiosk/kiosk.sh | âµx11vnc -storepasswd passwordgoeshere /home/kiosk/.x11vnc.pass | For Firefox: . | sudo apt-get install -y firefox sudo apt-mark hold firefox | Settings: . | General â†’ Startup | Make Defaultâ€¦ | General â†’ Language | Check your spelling as you type: Uncheck | General â†’ Browsing | Enable picture-in-picture video controls: Uncheck | General â†’ Browsing | Recommend extensions as you browse: Uncheck | General â†’ Browsing | Recommend features as you browse: Uncheck | Home â†’ New Windows and Tabs | Homepage and new windows: Blank Page | Home â†’ New Windows and Tabs | New tabs: Blank Page | Privacy &amp; Security â†’ Logins and Passwords | Ask to save logins and passwords for websites: Uncheck | Privacy &amp; Security â†’ Logins and Passwords | Show alerts about passwords for breached websites: Uncheck | Privacy &amp; Security â†’ Firefox Data Collection and Use â†’ Allow Firefox to send technical and interaction data to Mozilla: Uncheck | Privacy &amp; Security â†’ Firefox Data Collection and Use â†’ Allow Firefox to make personalized extension recommendations: Uncheck | Privacy &amp; Security â†’ Firefox Data Collection and Use â†’ Allow Firefox to install and run studies: Uncheck | . | about:configÂ  . | gfx.webrender.all: trueÂ  | layers.acceleration.force-enabled: trueÂ  | browser.tabs.warnOnClose: false | browser.tabs.warnOnCloseOtherTabs: false | browser.send_pings: falseÂ  | beacon.enabled: falseÂ  | alerts.useSystemBackend: trueÂ  | extensions.pocket.enabled: falseÂ  | browser.sessionstore.resume_from_crash: falseÂ  | toolkit.startup.max_resumed_crashes: -1 | browser.sessionstore.max_resumed_crashes: -1 | browser.disableResetPrompt: trueÂ  | . | Legg til nederst i /home/kiosk/kiosk.sh # Run Firefox in kiosk-mode /usr/bin/firefox --kiosk --private --new-window https://duck.com &amp; . | . | For Chromium: . | sudo apt-get install -y chromium-browser | Settings: . | Autofill â†’ Passwords â†’ Offer to save passwords: Uncheck | Autofill â†’ Passwords â†’ Auto Sign-in: Uncheck | Autofill â†’ Payment methods â†’ Save and fill payment methods: Uncheck | Autofill â†’ Payment methods â†’ Allow sites to check if you have payment methods saved: Uncheck | Autofill â†’ Addresses and more â†’ Save and fill addresses: Uncheck | Advanced â†’ Languages â†’ Spell check: Uncheck | Advanced â†’ Languages â†’ Language â†’ Offer to translate pages that arenâ€™t in a language you read: Unchecked | GjÃ¸r Chromium til default nettleser: Default Browser â†’ Make Default | . | Legg til nederst i /home/kiosk/kiosk.sh # Clear crash-flags if Chromium crashed to avoid warning banners sed -i 's/"exited_cleanly":false/"exited_cleanly":true/' /home/kiosk/.config/chromium/Default/Preferences sed -i 's/"exit_type":"Crashed"/"exit_type":"Normal"/' /home/kiosk/.config/chromium/Default/Preferences # Run Chromium in kiosk-mode /usr/bin/chromium-browser --kiosk https://duck.com &amp; . | . | Fjern Gnome Keyring passord (forskjellig fra login passord) . | Ã…pne Passwords and Keys | HÃ¸yreklikk pÃ¥ Passwords â†’ Passwords | Login â†’ Change PasswordÂ  | Skriv inn det eksisterende passordet og sett et nytt blankt passord | . | rebootÂ  . | NÃ¥r maskinen fÃ¥r startet igjen skal nettleseren vÃ¦re den eneste synlige applikasjonen. | Om du trenger Ã¥ gÃ¥ ut av kiosk-modus kan du klikke super-knappen eller drepe nettleseren fra en terminal fra en annen TTY. | . | . Automatisk reloading av nettside . Det finnes flere extensions pÃ¥ Firefox/Chrome web storene som lar deg automatisk reloade en nettside basert pÃ¥ et gitt intervall, men de ser litt sketchy ut, og det lar seg lett gjÃ¸re med cron og xdotool. | sudo apt-get install -y xdotoolÂ  | Bruk xprop | grep 'WM_CLASS(STRING)' | awk '{print $3 $4}' og klikk pÃ¥ et vindu for Ã¥ finne klassen til det, det som er listet som den andre verdien til WM_CLASS(STRING) er som regel den du er ute etter. | crontab -eÂ (endre firefox til den relevante applikasjonen) 0 */2 * * * ( DISPLAY=:0 xdotool search --onlyvisible --class firefox windowactivate --sync \%@ key ctrl+F5 ) . | . Automatisk oppdatering . # Mulig du mÃ¥ installere pakken unattended-upgrades om den ikke er installert allerede sudo apt-get install -y unattended-upgrades sudo vim /etc/apt/apt.conf.d/50unattended-upgrades # Kommenter inn og endre disse linjene "${distro_id}:${distro_codename}-updates"; Unattended-Upgrade::MinimalSteps "true"; Unattended-Upgrade::Remove-Unused-Kernel-Packages "true"; Unattended-Upgrade::Remove-Unused-Dependencies "true"; Unattended-Upgrade::Automatic-Reboot "true"; Unattended-Upgrade::Automatic-Reboot-Withusers "true"; Unattended-Upgrade::Automatic-Reboot-Time "02:00"; # Om du bruker Firefox, kommenter ogsÃ¥ inn disse linjene â€” # Firefox krever en omstart etter oppdatering, # antar at cron-jobben som kjÃ¸rer Shift+F5 fÃ¥r dette til Ã¥ stoppe. # Dette blir forsÃ¥vidt omgÃ¥tt med Ã¥ locke firefox-pakken, men... Unattended-Upgrade::InstallOnShutdown "true"; # Og gi den lengere tid pÃ¥ Ã¥ oppdatere under shutdown sudo vim /etc/systemd/logind.conf # Kommenter inn / endre InhibitDelayMaxSec=1800 # Om det er en laptop, kommenter ogsÃ¥ inn i logind.conf HandleLidSwitch=ignore sudo vim /etc/apt/apt.conf.d/20auto-upgrades # Kommenter inn disse linjene APT::Periodic::Update-Package-Lists "1"; APT::Periodic::Download-Upgradeable-Packages "1"; APT::Periodic::AutocleanInterval "7"; APT::Periodic::Unattended-Upgrade "1"; # Sjekk at det funker sudo unattended-upgrades --dry-run --debug # Sjekk om det har kjÃ¸rt: tail -f /var/log/unattended-upgrades/unattended-upgrades.log /var/log/dpkg.log /var/log/apt/history.log /etc/cron.daily/apt /etc/cron.daily/* /etc/crontab . Dim skjerm pÃ¥ tidsintervall . crontab -e # Dim skjermen kl. 17:00 hver dag, u-dim den kl. 07:00 hver hverdag 0 17 * * * ( DISPLAY=:0 xrandr --output "$(DISPLAY=:0 xrandr -q | grep ' connected' | head -1 | awk '{print $1}')" --brightness 0.2 ) 0 7 * * 1-5 ( DISPLAY=:0 xrandr --output "$(DISPLAY=:0 xrandr -q | grep ' connected' | head -1 | awk '{print $1}')" --brightness 1 ) .

47.title: Nixos installation
47.content: Installing NixOS â€” a less verbose step-by-step guide . This guide assumes you already have Windows installed on a shrinked partition if youâ€™ll be dual booting. This guide also assumes youâ€™re running UEFI, but differentiating steps will be noted. Note that some steps are only required for dual-boot or single-boot, and UEFI or BIOS/MBR (legacy boot). Installation . Before installing . âš  If youâ€™re dual booting, consider checking the size of your Windows EFI System Partition (this will be a shared /boot partition in NixOS) before doing anything else. Itâ€™ll most likely be about 100mb, which isnâ€™t enough for regular Windows+NixOS use. Sadly, resizing the first sector can be a bit of a (major) hassle (Iâ€™m not even sure you canâ€¦). The recommended size of your /boot partition is 512mb according to Nix, in order to â€œresizeâ€ it, see Resizing Windowsâ€™ EFI System Volume boot partition. After youâ€™ve fixed your /boot partition, you should reserve space on the disk for NixOS, this can be done by going into windows &gt; Super + r &gt; diskmgmt.msc &gt; right-click on your primary partition (labelled with a drive letter) &gt; Shrink Volumeâ€¦ &gt; and enter the size you want your NixOS installation to be (in mb, e.g. 250000) in Enter the amount of space to shrink in MB:. After that, right-click on the new partition &gt; Delete Volumeâ€¦ and Formatâ€¦. â„¹ Before you install Nix, or even boot from the installation media, you should make sure these prerequisites are met. | For dual boot . | If you want to replace an already existing linux installation with NixOS . | Boot into Windows | Open the run prompt (win+r) and enter diskmgmt.msc | Delete the existing linux partitions (make sure you leave Windowsâ€™ alone). Windows typically has one main NTFS partition (assigned to a drive letter, e.g. C:), a System Reserved NTFS partition, and a Recovery Partition: | . | Update Windows :â¾ | Disable Fast startup . | Open Control Panel â†’ System &amp; Security â†’ Power Options â†’ Choose what the power buttons do â†’ Change settings that are currently unavailable â†’ Uncheck â€œTurn on fast startup (recommended)â€ â†’ Save changes | . | . | Disable Secure boot in the BIOS | Create a bootable NixOS Minimal USB . | Using Rufus: . | Partition scheme: GPT | Target system: UEFI (non CSM) | File system: FAT32 | Cluster size: 8192 bytes | . | Balena Etcher is an easy alternative to Rufus | . | . ~ Installing NixOS ~ . Start by booting the computer from the installation media . UEFI/BIOS and network . To test whether youâ€™re running UEFI or BIOS (legacy boot), run the following command: test -d /sys/firmware/efi/efivars; echo $? If it returns 0, youâ€™re running UEFI, otherwise you should check your BIOS settings to see if you can enable UEFI mode (or continue the installation in legacy boot mode, could be viable if youâ€™re testing in a virtual machine or just donâ€™t have UEFI mode available.) . If you donâ€™t have an internet connection already, now is a good time to set one up â€” either by connecting the computer to a wireless network or by configuring wifi. If youâ€™re running a VM, it might be worth setting the networking mode to bridged for convenience, but NAT also works. To configure wifi: . | wpa_passphrase 'WIFI_SSID' 'WIFI_PASSWORD' &gt; /etc/wpa_supplicant.conf | sudo systemctl start wpa_supplicant.service | sudo systemctl status wpa_supplicant.service â€” try this command a couple of times until you see that the service has started | ping duckduckgo.com should now show that you have an internet connection. You may have to try this a few times as well | . This could also be a good time to ssh to your device if the keyboard isnâ€™t behaving as expected. Simply run passwd to set a password for the nixos user so you can ssh to it. Running ip a should display your local IP-address if youâ€™re connected to a network. You can then use this IP-address to ssh to your device (e.g. ssh nixos@10.0.0.40). Partitioning the disk . â„¹ Some commands may have to be run with sudo if you sshed to your device as the nixos-user. With dual boot, UEFI, LVM, and Luks disk encryption . | Run lsblk to get an overview over your disks and partitions. My disk was called nvme0n1, but the disk names can vary. In my case there were 4 pre-existing partitions created by Windows. $ lsblk # NAME MAJ:MIN RM SIZE RO TYPE MOUNTPOINT # loop0 7:0 0 631.3M 0 loop /nix/.ro-store # sda 8:0 1 57.8G 0 disk # â””â”€sda1 8:1 1 57.7G 0 part /iso # nvme0n1 259:0 0 476.9G 0 disk # â”œâ”€nvme0n1p1 259:1 0 100M 0 part # â”œâ”€nvme0n1p2 259:2 0 16M 0 part # â”œâ”€nvme0n1p3 259:3 0 200.7G 0 part # â””â”€nvme0n1p4 259:4 0 505M 0 part . | Partition the disk . | gdisk /dev/nvme0n1 | Create a new partition by entering n | Hit enter to select the suggested partition number (e.g. 5) | Hit enter to select the default value for the first sector | Hit enter to select the default value for the last sector | Enter 8e00 to select Linux LVM as the partition type | Enter w to write the changes | . | lsblk should now show a new child-partition of your disk called something along the lines of nvme0n1p5, it should fill the full size of the disk | Setup encryption . | Format the partition: cryptsetup luksFormat /dev/nvme0n1p5 and enter a password (this will be prompted at each boot) | Open the formatted partition: cryptsetup luksOpen /dev/nvme0n1p5 nvme0n1p5-crypt and enter the password that you chose. | . | lsblk should now show a child-partition under nvme0n1p5 called nvme0n1p5-crypt | Setup LVM in the encrypted partition . | Initiate a physical volume to be used by LVM: pvcreate /dev/mapper/nvme0n1p5-crypt | Create a volume group: vgcreate vgnixos /dev/mapper/nvme0n1p5-crypt | Create a swap volume: lvcreate -C y -L 24G -n swap vgnixos. Note that you may want to use more/less swap than me, in that case change 24G to the appropriate size. A general rule of thumb is that you should have about 1.5x the amount of installed RAM on your computer in swap, have a look at this StackOverflow answer for more information. | Create a volume for the rest of the space: lvcreate -l 100%FREE -n nixos vgnixos | . | lsblk should now show the volume group | Create the file systems . | Make vgnixos-nixos an ext4 filesystem: mkfs.ext4 /dev/vgnixos/nixos | Make swap: mkswap -L swap /dev/vgnixos/swap | mount /dev/vgnixos/nixos /mnt | mkdir /mnt/boot | mount /dev/nvme0n1p2 /mnt/boot â€” NOTE which partition to use here! If youâ€™re dual-booting, replace /dev/nvme0n1p2 with your Windows boot VFAT partition (see lsblk -f). | swapon /dev/vgnixos/swap | Check the UUID of the LVM: lsblk -f and make note of it! (Here itâ€™s important that you node the UUID of the â€œcrypto_LUKSâ€ disk. You will need to tell NixOS to use that disk by specifying the UUID later.) | . | . With single-boot (UEFI &amp; BIOS/MBR) . See the installation from the NixOS Manual. | Create the partitioning scheme (/dev/sda) . | For BIOS/MBR (legacy boot) . | parted /dev/sda -- mklabel msdos | parted /dev/sda -- mkpart primary 1MiB -8GiB | parted /dev/sda -- mkpart primary linux-swap -8GiB 100% | . | For UEFI . | parted /dev/sda -- mklabel gpt | parted /dev/sda -- mkpart primary 512MiB -8GiB | parted /dev/sda -- mkpart primary linux-swap -8GiB 100% | parted /dev/sda -- mkpart ESP fat32 1MiB 512MiB | parted /dev/sda -- set 3 esp on | . | . | Format the partitions . | mkfs.ext4 -L nixos /dev/sda1 | mkswap -L swap /dev/sda2 | mkfs.fat -F 32 -n boot /dev/sda3 | . | For creating LVM volumes, the LVM commands, e.g., pvcreate, vgcreate, and lvcreate (not documented for single-boot, see With dual boot UEFI and disk encryption). | For creating software RAID devices, use mdadm (not documented). | Mount the target file system on which NixOS should be installed on /mnt: mount /dev/disk/by-label/nixos /mnt | For UEFI . | mkdir -p /mnt/boot | mount /dev/disk/by-label/boot /mnt/boot | . | swapon /dev/sda2 | . Installing and configuring NixOS . | Generate nix config: nixos-generate-config --root /mnt | Open the config (nano seems to work better than vi(m) in the installer): nano /mnt/etc/nixos/configuration.nix and modify the default values to match this (where applicable, see comments): ```shell { config, pkgs, â€¦ }: | . { imports = [ ./hardware-configuration.nix ]; . boot.loader.systemd-boot.enable = true; boot.loader.efi.canTouchEfiVariables = true; # Skip if BIOS boot.initrd.luks.devices.â€nixosâ€ = { # Skip if youâ€™re not using luks encryption device = â€œ/dev/disk/by-uuid/"; # This is where you enter the UUID of the crypto_LUKS disk. preLVM = true; }; . networking.useDHCP = false; networking.interfaces..useDHCP = true; # Your network interface . time.timeZone = â€œEurope/Osloâ€; # Your timezone . environment.systemPackages = with pkgs; [ wget vim tmux ]; . services.openssh.enable = true; . sound.enable = true; hardware.pulseaudio.enable = true; . services.xserver.enable = true; services.xserver.layout = â€œnoâ€; # localectl list-x11-keymap-layouts services.xserver.xkbOptions = â€œeurosign:eâ€; # localectl list-x11-keymap-options services.xserver.xkbVariant = â€œnodeadkeysâ€; # localectl list-x11-keymap-variants &lt;layout&gt; . # Enable touchpad support services.xserver.libinput.enable = true; . # Enable the KDE Desktop Environment. services.xserver.displayManager.sddm.enable = true; services.xserver.desktopManager.plasma5.enable = true; . i18n.defaultLocale = â€œen_US.UTF-8â€; console = { font = â€œLat2-Terminus16â€; keyMap = â€œ${config.services.xserver.layout}â€; }; . # Define a user account. Donâ€™t forget to set a password with passwd. users.users. = { # Your username goes here isNormalUser = true; extraGroups = [ "wheel" ]; }; . system.stateVersion = â€œ21.05â€; # Donâ€™t change this unless you know what youâ€™re doing :) } ``` . | Finally, install NixOS by executing: nixos-install. | . Reboot! After this youâ€™ll have to sign in as root and set the password for your user account (the user defined in users.users.&lt;YOUR_USERNAME&gt;): passwd &lt;user&gt;. Other bits . Resizing Windowsâ€™ EFI System Volume (boot) partition . â„¹ This will only work if youâ€™re willing to sacrifice your Windows installation, as it happens during the installation procedure. You might be able to get around this by cloning the partition and recreating it with a larger size, but Iâ€™m unsure. | Boot the computer from the Windows installation media, you can get the iso from here (or here for WIndows 11). You can also go to *Settings &gt; Update &amp; Security &gt; Recovery &gt; Reset this PC | Get started*. | . | Before partitioning the disks, press Shift + F10 to open the command line. | Enter diskpart. | Enter list disk â€” a list of disks will appear, take note of the number next to your disk (most likely 0) and select it with select disk 0. | Create the partition: create partition efi size=512 (size in MiB) | exit | . Steps found here: Windows â€” Creating EFI partition before installing Windows 10 . Installation procedure heavily inspired by Stian LÃ¥gstadâ€™s guide.
